about_the_game:
This personality pack introduces the new heroine type “Cunning.”

Now you’ll be able to play the yotogi and H-events you enjoyed with Muku, Majime, and Rindere with Cunning as well.

～What Kind of Girl is Cunning?～
On the outside, she's cool, competent, friendly, and kind, but on the inside, she's cunning and calculating.

Behind her cold exterior, joy, anger, and other emotions occasionally appear on her face.
Her goal is to get rich, and she's hoping to attract the Empire Club owner with her well-honed skills.
However, she gets flustered when people point out her minor slip-ups, and it's hard for her to keep up her veneer of confidence.
Romantic situations are her weakness; she sometimes sticks her foot in her mouth in conversations with Master…

・1 new normal body maid outfit!
・1 new normal body lingerie set!
・1 new normal body hairstyle!
・Over 70 playable yotogi skills!
・2 types of New Yotogi events!
・4 different branches to explore between the 2 New Yotogi events!
・2 exclusive New Yotogi route!

・Hiring interview events, affection increase events, stat increase events, and plenty more opportunities for Master to talk to Cunning!

・Conversation events with Muku, Majime, and Rindere are also included!

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains adult content intended for individuals 18 years of age or older.
It includes nudity, sex scene, and blatantly sexual imagery, as well as imagery that has sexual implications.
If you are not yet 18+ or if you are accessing from any country or located where adult material is specifically prohibited by law, do not play this game.

detailed_description:
This personality pack introduces the new heroine type “Cunning.”

Now you’ll be able to play the yotogi and H-events you enjoyed with Muku, Majime, and Rindere with Cunning as well.

～What Kind of Girl is Cunning?～
On the outside, she's cool, competent, friendly, and kind, but on the inside, she's cunning and calculating.

Behind her cold exterior, joy, anger, and other emotions occasionally appear on her face.
Her goal is to get rich, and she's hoping to attract the Empire Club owner with her well-honed skills.
However, she gets flustered when people point out her minor slip-ups, and it's hard for her to keep up her veneer of confidence.
Romantic situations are her weakness; she sometimes sticks her foot in her mouth in conversations with Master…
